attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: you could build a thousand prisons and it will still not stop the overcrowding. you need to sort out the sentences being given. LIFE should mean LIFE and not seven to ten years. Get prisoners working for their keep. they do this in other countries why not here. reoffending burglars should be tagged from 6pm until 8am the following day.  get this sorted and prison s may be a deterrent not a holiday which some lags seem to think at the moment.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/toughersentences/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
